label: Opener
description: The standard Reaper opener establishes Death's Design, generates resources aggressively, and transitions into the double Enshroud burst window under Arcane Circle.

steps.reasoning: Free cast outside of combat. Grants the Soulsow buff which enables Harvest Moon later for movement or extra damage.
Ranged GCD to initiate combat before the boss is pulled into melee range. Starts the GCD rolling early.
Apply Death's Design debuff (+10% damage taken) for 30s. This must be up before any burst damage. Also generates 10 Soul.
Aggressive early use of Soul Slice to generate 50 Soul gauge quickly. Burns charges in the first 10s (per RPR_Default line 57).
